title: Journal of Clinical and Experimental Psychopathology and Quarterly Review of Psychiatry and Neurology

preceded-by.note: Journal of Clinical and Experimental Psychopathology

additional-note: A 1984 renewal for the 1956 book 'The Great Physiodynamic Therapies in Psychiatry: An Historical Reappraisal' mentions that portions originally appeared in Journal of Clinical and Experimental Psychopathology and Journal of Clinical and Experimental Psychopathology. If any such portions appeared in 1956 issues of this journal, they might be covered by that renewal.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
